abstract: If you look at our cover this week and think maybe you have enough worries in your life without adding anthrax back to the list, I completely understand. I feel that way myself sometimes.
snippet: If you look at our cover this week and think maybe you have enough worries in your life without adding anthrax back to the list, I completely understand. I feel that way myself sometimes.

headline.main: This Sunday: Excuse Me While I Get Fitted for a Hazmat Suit
